channel.title: Armageddon 639 {Possibly The Best}
channel.description:
There are thousands of private runescape servers, why should you choose Armageddon?
www.armageddonrsps.webs.com
[img]http://i.imgur.com/L3Bb9.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/agCNH.jpg[/img]
Armageddon is run on an excellent VPS with a Phenom Quad Core 2.70 GHZ 8 Gig Ram so there will never be lag! Our staff is chosen through a strict application and reputation-based process. The owner is dedicated and willing to indulge himself into hours of work to accomplish only the best for Armageddon. The server is starting its growth process and the economy is fresh, so it's time to start the adventure! Armageddon is a small (soon to be large) community with tight-knit values and friendships. We use "community" clans to promote healthy activity amongst our players!
Some Information:
- 24/7 Active PvP PvM and Skilling Community - Great Support Staff & Development Team - Great Pking Community & Clans - Fully Working Skilling & Combat System - Stable Economy & Active Market - All Working Skills - Quick [But reasonable] Combat Leveling so you can get to pking fast! - Rigorous Skilling and PvM - Working Minigames - Active, Friendly Community Forum - Customized Areas for better player-friendly gameplay - Daily Server Updates - Custom FunPk Area [Its HUUUUUUUUUGE so people can spread out and fight ] - AMAZING Donator Benefits such as donor zones, extra xp, and titles! -Fully working clan chat -Fully working skillcapes
Honored To Present The Massive List of Bosses:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4FNN9.jpg[/img]
-Soul Wars Boss -Jad (Fire Cape) -Corporal beast -Tormented demons -King Black Dragon -Fully working God Wars -Fully working Slayer creatures (eg. Dark Beast) -All Dagganoth kings -Barrelchest Anchor -All dragons [Metal, Colored, and Frost] -Nex with Minions and Phases -2 Major Dungeeneoring bosses (They Talk ^-^) -Bork! -Penance Queen -Kalphite Queen -AND MUCH MORE I FORGOT TO NAME :D
Weapons & Armour:
-Hand-Canon -Chaotic Weapons -GodSwords with working effects! -Torva / Pernix / Virtus -Primal / SoulBell -Fully working Void & Korasi -Claws (with an accurate special formula) -Vesta / Statius / Morrigan / Zuriel -Barrows Armour with full Effects. -And all the others obviously....
Mini-Games
-Dungeoneering {70.99% Complete} -Barrows - Donator -Duel arena -Funpk (Multi) -Warrior Guild -JAD -Fight Caves -Castle wars
Our Specialties!
-Customized Sklling area! -Pkers Shop Area -Donators Shop and Monsters area -Custom Titles -Custom Quests! -Custom Suggestion System -LRC and Crystal Mining!
Work Under Progress/ Developing:
-Better Donator Zone -Loyalty Titles 100% -70% Construction -Better and Customized Interfaces -Ingame and Website HiScores -Many more smaller updates
'Thank you for reading through our post. Indubitably, the veracity that we endeavor to bring forth exceeds expectations far above those of other Rsps communities. Just ask yourself. Do I want to be a part of the change? Do I want an experience like no other? Do I want to be a part of a potentially great community? Do I want to say "I was there" when you are still with our community years from now? Well, we do, and we hope that you indulge yourselves within our hard work as well.'
Quote and Passage From Staff Member:
"The head coder for Armageddon is very clever and has only included the finest aspects of Runescape. I was astonished to see such a well coded server as I've seen the other attempts before that we've tried, collaborating with others like Cody and Lauren. I myself have played many popular Private Servers and am proud to say that Armageddon has a lot more potential then the others and is much more packed with essential features. Where else would you find ONE single Private Server that would have 15+ bosses like Nomad, PQ, Dag Kings and still balance the fighting with skills like Dungeoneering, Construction, Summoning or occupy players with LRC or Quests. Questing is one fundamental aspect of Runescape. Yet the minority of Private Servers have that, its a shame. And to end it together, this Private Server is based on Runescape when it was in its full glory, its not an old 317 or an over complicated new 711+ revision, its the best you can get off Runescape!"
~Nexlk (Proud Admin @ Armageddon)
Visit: www.armageddonrsps.webs.com

@Nexlktoday wrote:

There are thousands of private runescape servers, why should you choose Armageddon?

www.armageddonrsps.webs.com

L3Bb9.png843×588

agCNH.jpg1280×1024

Armageddon is run on an excellent VPS with a Phenom Quad Core 2.70 GHZ 8 Gig Ram so there will never be lag! Our staff is chosen through a strict application and reputation-based process. The owner is dedicated and willing to indulge himself into hours of work to accomplish only the best for Armageddon. The server is starting its growth process and the economy is fresh, so it’s time to start the adventure! Armageddon is a small (soon to be large) community with tight-knit values and friendships. We use “community” clans to promote healthy activity amongst our players!

Some Information:

  • 24/7 Active PvP PvM and Skilling Community
  • Great Support Staff & Development Team

‘Thank you for reading through our post. Indubitably, the veracity that we endeavor to bring forth exceeds expectations far above those of other Rsps communities. Just ask yourself. Do I want to be a part of the change? Do I want an experience like no other? Do I want to be a part of a potentially great community? Do I want to say “I was there” when you are still with our community years from now? Well, we do, and we hope that you indulge yourselves within our hard work as well.’

“The head coder for Armageddon is very clever and has only included the finest aspects of Runescape. I myself have played many popular Private Servers and am proud to say that Armageddon has a lot more potential then the others and is much more packed with essential features. Where else would you find ONE single Private Server that would have 15+ bosses like Nomad, PQ, Dag Kings and still balance the fighting with skills like Dungeoneering, Construction, Summoning or occupy players with LRC or Quests. Questing is one fundamental aspect of Runescape. Yet the minority of Private Servers have that, its a shame. And to end it together, this Private Server is based on Runescape when it was in its full glory, its not an old 317 or an over complicated new 711+ revision, its the best you can get off Runescape!”
